ygData.subject: RE: Resist on chains gotten worse lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant is evile(tm)  They do things to intentionally aggravate players - my top ten reason why: 10 the whole bard class 9  nerfing 8 Tovax Varmar, Holly
ygData.messageBody:
Verant is evile(tm) They do things to intentionally aggravate players - my
top ten reason why:

10 the whole bard class
9 nerfing
8 Tovax Varmar, Holly Windstalker, Cross Treebow, & Merissa Sand Whisper
(Hurd too)
7 BlackBurrow Paw and Crushbone for newbies
6 HighPass for kiddies
5 Sol & Guk for middies
4 the zone block bug going from qey hills to west k
3 fake cons or twinked named mobs (Dvinn, Dorn, Gixx, Zytl, etal)
2 green casters
1 auto-attack defaulted to the 'a' key

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 2:34 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist on chains gotten worse
lately?

From: <kim@...>

only purpose is to annoy the players. You do not make a
loyal
playerbase by intentionally annoying the players.
